subject: I get this stuff toooo.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
From the tape player's speaker it's "Jesus---Promised---Heaven", but after
digitizing--"Jesus--Is In---Heaven" with -is in- sounding more like a cough.
Oooor, "Jesus isn't heaven"  yeah, some pair-a-doilies goin' on.

 Frank-S

F om he ape playe 's speake i 's "Jesus---P omised---Hea en", bu a e digi izing--"Jesus--Is In---Hea en" wi h -is in- sounding mo e like a cough. Oooo , "Jesus isn' hea en"  yeah, some pai -a-doilies goin' on.

 
 F ank-S
